scripts.deploy-server: now deploy src/server | node -e "process.stdin.on('data', chunk => { var line = chunk.toString('utf8'); if(/Ready\!/.test(line)) process.stdout.write(line.match(/(https\:\S+)/)[0]+'/'); });" > SERVER_URI
scripts.deploy-client-preprod: git add dist/www && git commit -m 'update dist/www' && echo 'dist/www changes committed' || echo 'no changes to dist/www' && git branch -D gh-pages && git subtree split --prefix dist/www -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages
scripts.start: npm i && run-s build:lib build:parser && run-p serve watch:parser watch:test
scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover --report text --report json-summary --report html --dir coverage -x 'src/lib/**' _mocha -- --require babel-core/register test/unit --recursive
scripts.build:parser:
pegjs -e '/* eslint-disable */
var parser; export default parser' < src/issuemd/parser.pegjs > src/lib/issuemd-parser.js
scripts.build:issuemd: npm run build:issuemd-echo --silent | buble | uglifyjs > issuemd.min.js && replace __ISSUEMD_VERSION__ $npm_package_version issuemd.min.js
scripts.build:client: cpx -C 'src/www/**/!(*.js|develop.html)*' dist/www && PROD=true npm run build:app-echo --silent | buble | uglifyjs > dist/www/app.js
scripts.watch:test: nodemon -w src -w test/unit -e js -x 'npm run test:unit -- --reporter dot'
scripts.watch:coverage: nodemon -w src -w test/unit -e js -x 'npm run test:coverage'
